entity.name: daily
entity.query: SELECT id, resource_url, link_text, search_term, click_category, click_time, log_time, is_present_flag FROM quicksearchdata
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT id, resource_url, link_text, search_term, click_category, click_time, log_time, is_present_flag FROM quicksearchdata WHERE id='${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT id, resource_url, link_text, search_term, click_category, click_time, log_time, is_present_flag FROM quicksearchdata WHERE log_time > '${dih.last_index_time}'
